name: Luna Ape Protocol
description: We combine revolutionary auto-staking features with passive Luna Classic rewards to make staking easier and more rewarding for investors. Project description between 400-600 words: Dual Rewards system with Autostaking and Autocompounding at 200,000% APY and a daily 2.1% interest rate! A sustainable, powerful Protocol that provides you with our Native Token LUNAPE and Luna Classic! Reach generational wealth with this new life changing project! Dedicated to rewarding holders in Luna Classic, burning the supply of Luna Classic and leading the movement of change for Luna Classic. The contract will purchase Luna Classic and send to burn address automatically. This will aid in our mission to increase the amount of Luna Classic being burnt. We believe this will support the recovery and will work hard to promote other major players to follow suit and Burn alongside us. The token will reward users with Luna Classic tokens to help investors prepare and build their supply before Luna Classic makes its return. You can keep it, sell it, or our personal favourite, send it to the burn wallet, to help further burn even more Luna Classic. Luna Ape will work tirelessly to build its Shill Community to support Luna Classic and bring positive messages to Defi. We are partnering with other organisations to achieve this goal. We will have a number of features within our Ecosystem to support the Project and community.
